column1: Uchi////From the first to the last course was straight up divinity on a simple plate. Kaitlin had everything timed to the 'T'. The runners were speedy
column3: and resourceful. My favorite sushi is now the bond makimoni (as seen in the picture provided). No if
column5: or buts about it. Especially with the eggplant and shallots fused into the roll. And I'm not even a fan of eggplant. Miraculous flavors. And don't even get me started on the sauce!
